articles.title: Berrios gets quick hook as Blue Jays lose ugly series opener against Rays - Sportsnet.ca
articles.description: Toronto Blue Jays right-hander Jose Berrios lasted just two innings as his inconsistent season continued in a 10-5 loss against the Tampa Bay Rays on Thursday. Tampa is now just one game behind Toronto for the top wild card spot in the American League.
articles.content: ST. PETERSBURG, Fla. Maybe if Jose Berrios snares that soft Manuel Margot comebacker, or simply leaves it for Cavan Biggio to collect, the opener of a meaningful four-game set against the Tampa Bay R… [+4304 chars]

articles.description: Agency assaults harmless asteroid in maneuver that could one day save Earth
